divs: Sighting DetailsFrom my Facebook post: Alright, at least I know Im not crazy, now my neighbors saw this: for 2 nights now, theres been a red "star" twinkling just over the trees (Im in Concord facing west) and this thing changes colors while staying still, then two little balls of light come out of it, and after about 20 minutes, the red star changes colors and then morphs into 5 or 6 really long oblong like "dashes" and its shines a bright light and then disappears, but then so do about 5 or 6 stars that are around the sky. Like the whole bottom half of the horizon goes dark. Tonight, there were two white stars that went into the red star. Me n my neighbors were just watching this in our cul-de-sac. FREAKY!!!!!
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Painesville
There were no other sightings in Painesville on or around October 9th 2013
